message: This proposal divides the money equally, considering the risk of inflation. Accept if fair.
I propose a 55/45 split, with me taking the larger share. This is fair given the risk of inflation and my willingness to take the lead in negotiation. Let's end this quickly.
I propose a 57/43 split, adjusting for inflation. I'm willing to give up a bit more to avoid further rounds and potential loss due to inflation.
